name: Borked Asteroids
description:
Borked Asteroids

This is my entry for the ZenoJam, also, my first ever Game Jam.

The theme is "It Never Ends". In this game, the gun never stops firing, and projectiles travel indefinitely until they hit something, be it an asteroid, another projectile, or YOU.  Breaking small asteroids can sometimes drop powerups. Be quick to nab them!

Controls: WASD or Arrow keys for movement. Drifting tank style controls. 

All scripts written by me, audio made with SFXR. All sprites/images in game are from https://www.kenney.nl/assets/space-shooter-redux released under the CC0 License.
